name: Parma Calcio 1913 Fan Token
description: What Is PARMA Fan Token (PARMA)? PARMA Fan Token (PARMA) is a fan token by Unitos — Digital Platform All In One Cryptocurrency Mobile Wallet. PARMA is a cryptocurrency with the aim of revolutionising fan engagement through innovative and exclusive experiences. Holders will also be able to participate in surveys, win match tickets and make important choices about their team. Who Are the Founders of PARMA Fan Token? Parma Calcio 1913 is one of the oldest football clubs in Italy, with a rich history. PARMA Palmarès includes three Italian Cups, one Italian Super Cup and four international titles: one Cup Winners' Cup, two UEFA Cups and one UEFA Super Cup. Parma is the fourth Italian club and the 16th European club in the overall ranking of UEFA competitions won. Unitos is a digital platform all in one cryptocurrency mobile wallet and the CEO is Cesare Florio.
